Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2011 03:45PM Irie4now wrote: Hi, I have just been scheduled for BMX, sentinal node bx, with direct to implant surgery for Oct. 25th.  Very nervous, they will be using Alloderm (cadaver skin) had to read up on it to calm my self over the "cadaver" part. Tehe lists are great for what to bring, I am also bringing the Colgate wisps to use for brushing teeth the first day.  I feel prepared on that front, just very nervous.  Good  luck to all, prayers.
Posts.Title: Any October 2011 Surgeries out there want to wait together? gamergirl GrandmaV
